Room.Name: Side Show Tent
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large tent with a number of side show attractions.
Room.LongDescription: A crowd is gathered around the bearded lady, and an even bigger group is around JoJo the dog faced boy. A little distance away you can see a a muscular weight lifter performing incredible feats of strength. Everywhere you look there is a crowd of people, all with their mouths hanging open, and their wallets totally unprotected.
